document_data.name: Crawling Subsumption
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/Candlekeep Forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2013)/12-31 - Crawling Subsumption}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Crawling subsumption''' was a frightful, unique [[spell]] that assimilated the target's powers.
document_data.Effects: If successful, the spell would have stolen the target's powers, and probably subsumed its mind, too.
document_data.History: This spell was used by a [[Red Wizard]] known only as the [[Masked One]] in the lead-up to the [[Time of Troubles]] in the {{YearlinkName|1358}}. He developed the power to dissolve individuals and subsume their power, his only real accomplishment.{{cite book/Cloak of Shadows||10}}
